pages.text: Westeroprion is a polychaete that lived during the devonian period. It is known from many saw like teeth and probably resembled a bobbit worm in life. It was likely an ambush predator, hiding in burrows and lunging outwards to catch prey that passed overhead.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw/Cooked Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Eggs or Break its burrow
